group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*

group_1.textRight: I didn't expect to come across another@Demon so soon…
I'm as tired as you'd expect.
…Chizuru?
Hm…?
Erm…may you…let go of my sleeve…?

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:0.8][chara:104601:lipSynch_1]I might…

group_1.textRight: What…?

group_1.textLeft: I might…be getting married…!

group_1.textRight: WHAT?!
Do you mean…is that what's been@bothering you?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…

group_1.textRight: You may be getting married…and thus@shall lose your freedom…

group_1.textLeft: Exactly…!

group_1.textRight: Do you know you'll be wedded to…?

group_1.textLeft: Someone in your family, I think,@but I don't know who…

group_1.textRight: A member of the Mizuna Clan, then…@Well…given our current relationship…I suppose…

group_1.textLeft: I…
All I can do is train and practice@murdering people…
I've never practiced marriage stuff@like you, Tsuyu…
It's impossible… There's no way I can@do this…

group_1.textRight: I see…
Hmm…
I may be able to assist you in that regard.
I'll be your training partner for whatever@practice you need.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't mean it! Sorry, I lied!

group_1.textRight: W-what was the lie?! The marriage?!

group_1.textLeft: No…that part's true… But what scares me@isn't the training, really…

group_1.textRight: Then what is it…?

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid…of being with someone@I don't know…
After I heard what my dad said…@I tried going to sleep…
None of it sounded real to me,@so I tried imagining it for a sec…
And knowing nothing about the other@person…makes me so scared…

group_1.textRight: How adorable…

group_1.textLeft: Of course you can think that!@'Cause you aren't afraid, Tsuyu!
But this whole thing with me getting punted in front@of a total stranger, and bam, he's my husband…
The hell am I supposed to do if he ends up@being a piece of shit?!

group_1.textRight: I understand your fears…but that's@how things are, isn't it…?

group_1.textLeft: I don't want this!
At least let it be someone I fucking know!
Nnh… *Sobs*

group_1.textRight: Oh, Chizuru...
Do you feel better now?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…sorry…
…All of this would be so much easier@if you were a guy.

group_1.textRight: When you put it like that, I feel just@the same.
If you were a man, I'd be happy knowing@what kind of person you were.
But…
Were we not Battle Shamanesses,@we never would have met.

group_1.textLeft: Hnn…I'm glad we're both women, then.

group_1.textRight: For now, rather than let anxiety consume you, you@should confront your father about this directly.

group_1.textLeft: Okay…I'll do that.
Huh? You think I'm marrying you off?
What the hell are you talking about?@I could never do that.

group_1.textRight: …Huh?
What?! You talked about it yesterday, though!

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday…?
…Oh, that.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that! You were discussing it@in the dead of the night!

group_1.textLeft: I was joking.
The Taito Gang needs you right now.@I can't have you marrying anyone.
I need you working for us for at least@another two or three years yet.

group_1.textRight: Seriously?! I was so worried!

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's a rare sight…
Gather around, everyone! Chizuru's crying!

group_1.textRight: Goddammit, Dad, I will NEVER forgive you@for this! I'll get you back someday!

group_1.textCenter: I might be a little too hasty about some things.
